input.sentences: [male] is ready for his graduation from college
his family takes a photo as he heads to the stage to grab his degree
after the graduation ceremony he heads back to his house for a graduation gathering
his friends and family attend the gathering and take photos
towards the end of the nights the friends play pool
output.sentences: A man prepared for his graduation.
He made sure to find his family during the ceremony.
Afterwards his family gathered for a party.
His friends enjoyed a beer with him.
They celebrated well into the night.
